tab1.text1:
Thank you for joining this server! You can join our discord by clicking the Discord button below!


SETTINGS:

- Harvest: x25
- Taming: x100
- Collision: Enabled
- Custom Craft
- Bushberry System for Bosses
- Active Staffs
